thread.title: BRIEF-Playtech updates on acquisitions of Plus500 and Ava Trade
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Playtech updates on acquisitions of Plus500 and Ava Trade

title: BRIEF-Playtech updates on acquisitions of Plus500 and Ava Trade
text:
BRIEF-Playtech updates on acquisitions of Plus500 and Ava Trade Sept 18 
Sept 18 Playtech Plc 
* Due to high profile nature of Playtech's acquisition of Plus500, receipt of all regulatory approvals is taking longer 
* Statutorily required regulatory assessment of proposed acquisition should be completed by end of November 2015 
* Still expects acquisition of Ava Trade Ltd. to complete around end of september or early october 2015 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: Trending On Reuters
